definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: Add a little salt or sugar substitute depending on your taste.
sentences.chinese: 還可根據你的口味加入少許鹽或代糖。

sentences.english: Make sure you don't use artificial sweeteners as an excuse to eat lots of other sweets.
sentences.chinese: 要確定你不會把代糖當做你喫其它大量甜食的藉口。

sentences.english: That's why millions of people drink diet sodas and eat foods that contain artificial sweeteners in place of sugar.
sentences.chinese: 這就是爲什麼成千上萬的人喝減肥汽水和喫代糖食品。

sentences.english: Check with your doctor about the safety of using artificial sweeteners.
sentences.chinese: 不妨向你的醫生請教使用代糖的安全性。

sentences.english: Using aspartame and saccharin may also help purge the urge for real sugar.
sentences.chinese: 使用阿斯巴甜和代糖也有助於消除你對真糖的慾望。

sentences.english: Splenda in the gut may impact more than just the balance of intestinal flora.
sentences.chinese: 代糖在腸道可能會影響不僅僅是平衡腸道菌羣。

definition: Stevia extract, used as sugar substitute

pinyin: gao1 guo3 tang2 yu4 mi3 tang2 jiang1

definition: see 反式脂肪[fan3 shi4 zhi1 fang2]
